original_definition: 'ice-making compartment' means a frozen compartment with a target temperature and storage conditions of 0 °C, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
generated_definition: 'ice-making compartment' means a compartment in a refrigeration appliance used to store and freeze water to produce ice.

Article 2: ‘0-star compartment’ and ‘ice-making compartment’ means a frozen compartment with a target temperature and storage conditions of 0 °C, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
‘0-star compartment’ and ‘ice-making compartment’ means afrozen compartmentwith atarget temperature and storage conditions of 0 °C, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
